snippet: Daniil Trifonov returned to Carnegie Hall on Thursday night with a recital that included the Scherzo from his own Piano Sonata as an encore.
abstract: Corinna da Fonseca-Wollheim reviews performance by Russian pianist Daniil Trifonov at Carnegie Hall.
lead_paragraph: Daniil Trifonov returned to Carnegie Hall on Thursday night with a recital that included the Scherzo from his own Piano Sonata as an encore.

headline.seo: Daniil Trifonov Returns to Carnegie Hall
headline.main: Infusing Études With a Kaleidoscope of Flavors
headline.print_headline: Infusing Études With a Kaleidoscope of Flavors
